Package org.rootsdev.polygenea

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    Node.XRefer
    There are various ways a Node might be represented in JSON: as its UUID, its index, or as an object; and if as an object it might or might not contain a !uuid field and might represent any nested Nodes in various ways as well.
    NodeLookup
    A NodeLookup allows nodes to change node references in JSON into Node objects.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Database
    The Database class represents a set of Node objects and provides indexed performance for UUID-based node lookups and incoming edge queries.
    JSONParser
    A class of static methods for parsing JSON into classes from java.util and java.lang.
    JSONParser.JSONOrderer
    A comparator for sorting arbitrary JSON objects, used in forcing lists to be sets.
    Node
    Node is a superclass of all Polygenea node objects.
    Node.XRefer.Compressor  
    UUID5
    This class contains static methods that leverage UUID and MessageDigest to create version-5 UUIDs with full namespace support.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    JSONParser.ListOrSet
    Used to force lists to be sets.
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    JSONParser.MalformedJSONException
    The exception thrown by parsers in this class.
    Node.JSONificationException
    Generated by the various string parsing methods if the input is not a DAG string or if it is not a stand-alone string and the parsing DAG doesn't have the needed nodes.
  • Annotation Types Summary 
    Annotation Type Description
    HasIdentity
    A node annotated with @HasIdentity will be considered distinct from other nodes of the same type even if those other nodes have identical fields.
